overview: Blacked thinks you better buckle up, because it's time to ride with the Baddies. This series hooks you up with troublemakers who love to bend the rules. Featured cover girl Gabbie Carter has suffered in a sexless marriage long enough. She's always been a dutiful wife, but now she's ready to slip into lingerie and do something naughty. Penelope Cross, Abbie Maley, and Alexis Crystal are all throwing their reputations to the wind.
title: Baddies 7
